::KitKat::

She thought about what had taken place. She now had Megatron, her 
once feared leader and made him an ally. Aracnia was now her ally as 
well.  She knew that once the Allince was gone, the coucil would take 
over earth.  But Destructor kept after her about the maximals.  Why 
did he feel that they needed the maximals? Were they not thier 
enemies?  She couldn't fathom the reason why he would want to make an 
allience with the maximals.  She planned to  pull him aside and ask 
him.  But something else preyed on her mind. This Gabreil, he had 
mentionted that her and Destructor would spread the Predacon Empire 
across the galaxy.  She wasn't sure, but in order for that to happen, 
something would have had to have happened to Drillbit. That thought 
send a shiver up her spine. 

She walked down the hall, still pondering about all this.
